grails-app.controllers
Class WaveRobotBaseController

java.lang.Object
  grails-app.controllers.WaveRobotBaseController

class WaveRobotBaseController

WaveRobotBaseController

Default robot controller implementation. Some of the code is inherited of the com.google.wave.api.AbstractRobotServlet class and and refactored as Grails/Groovy controller code.

author:
david.trattnig

Property Summary
def capabilitiesXml

Renders the mandatory Wave capabilities.xml document holding the meta data of the implemented robot

def processEvents

Triggers the procession of the robot implementation by the wave service.

def robotProfile

Renders the active robot's profile

WaveService waveService
